metadata.title: CVE-2019-17026 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect alias information in IonMonkey JIT compiler for setting arrayelements could lead to a type confusion. We are aware of targeted attacksin the wild abusing this flaw. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR <68.4.1, Thunderbird < 68.4.1, and Firefox < 72.0.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
